official_title: A bill to insure the equal protection of the laws and to protect the liberty of citizens as guaranteed by the fourteenth amendment, by eliminating Federal court jurisdiction over forced school attendance.

summary.text: Eliminates Federal court jurisdiction to issue any order having the effect of requiring an individual to attend any particular school.

titles.title: A bill to insure the equal protection of the laws and to protect the liberty of citizens as guaranteed by the fourteenth amendment, by eliminating Federal court jurisdiction over forced school attendance.
